Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute near 119th/Marshfield
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Marshfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 119th/Marshfield.

Eastbound buses will operate via 119th, Vincennes, 115th, Marshfield, 119th, then resume their normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 119th, Ashland, 115th, Vincennes, 119th, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 71st/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 71st, due to a street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, and 71st, due to a street blockage near 71st/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Marine Drive/Gunnison
ShortDescription: SB 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Exp buses are rr via Foster, Sheridan, Lawrence, Marine Drive & over normal route, due to street blockage nr Marine Drive/Gunnison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Sheridan, Lawrence, Marine Drive, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Marine Drive/Gunnison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Wilson
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near the area of Wilson due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near the area of Wilson due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
